hintTaskSectionSelector: Section to which the task will be added
labelWelcomeLogin: , if you already have a password.
labelWelcomeStartAnonymously: The data will be available from this device until the browser cookies are cleared. If you like, you can always sign up and all your tasks will be automatically transferred to your new account
helpH1: todo.works - A list of tasks, that allows you to start regularly from clean sheet.
helpSmartphone: Quickly write down the new task as soon as it came to mind. Just open the site from your smartphone, tablet or computer - and you're ready to enter the task. The created tasks are displayed in the "incoming" column.
helpEvening: When there is free time, for example in the evening - classify incoming tasks: select the icons and arrange them by folders. Every evening or morning, make a list of tasks for today: to do this, select the cases you like and select the checkbox ☑ "I'll do it today". To divide today's tasks into groups, add delimiters to the list of today's tasks.
helpMeeting: If you delegate a task to someone: start the task with its name, then specify a text of the task via the space-dash-space, for example: Peter - send invoice. When meeting with a colleague, you can filter out all of his assignments by entering his name in the search field.
helpFilter: If there are too many tasks and they do not fit on the screen - hide completed or not requiring activity.
helpChecklist: When the list is finally filled, create a new list on the weekend. Consistently go through each task from the old list: strike out completed and canceled tasks, and move to the new list remaining tasks. In the process of transfer tasks can be renamed.
resultAllreadyExist: A user with such an email address is already registered on the site. An email with a link for password recovery was sent to his e-mail.
resultSignupOK: An email with a link to confirm your registration has been sent to your e-mail. Follow the link from the email to set the password and activate your account.
